alert.note: Alert for Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Zapata County through 730 PM CDT... At 657 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Zapata High School, or near Zapata, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zapata, Bustamante, Medina, Zapata High School, Zapata County Fire Department, Zapata Middle School, Siesta Shores, Zapata County Public Library, Las Palmas and Falcon Mesa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
